name: Iron Vanguard
description: Iron Vanguards reinforce their Ostrumite systems into layered plating and kinetic dampers, becoming immovable frontline bulwarks.

3.name: Ostrumite Plating
3.description: While wearing medium armor or wielding a shield, you gain increased AC and defensive benefits.

3.name: Anchor Protocol
3.description: As a bonus action, you become an immovable point, gaining save advantages and slowing nearby enemies.

7.name: Frontline Control
7.description: Enemies provoke opportunity attacks from you even if they Disengage, and you can impose disadvantage when they attack allies.

11.name: Reactive Countermeasures
11.description: Your defensive reactions empower your next attack and force enemies back.

15.name: Zone of Denial
15.description: While anchored, enemies near you struggle to attack allies and trigger free counterattacks when entering your zone.

18.name: Unbreakable Core
18.description: Your damage reduction improves, attackers risk being stunned, and you regain charges when critically wounded.
